timeline.bodyText: should this be completed?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: @zohrehj this is a sub-screen, not the main section level 'mark as complete'. I think it should be ok.
replies.author: SR-btc

replies.bodyText:
I don't think users will know what content-complete means. I prefer we just go with:
"Form step marked complete"
replies.author: jkrogers18

timeline.bodyText:
Make this:
The study has been published as an upcoming study.
timeline.author: jkrogers18

timeline.bodyText: Make this "The study has been resumed."

"The study has been removed from the list of upcoming studies."

timeline.bodyText: Is the timezone hardcoded here? This is configurable in the application.properties file I believe.
timeline.author: jkrogers18
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -360,7 +362,8 @@
 
   public static final String SERVER_TIME_ZONE = "America/New_York";

replies.bodyText: No, we are not using this  anywhere now and it can actually be removed from the file. We'll fix this file and raise a new PR for it later.
